resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

   And no performance difference in other parquet-encoding benchmark cases.

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
Implement 'min_max_neon' with Arm64 GoLang Assembly:

{code:java}
int32_max_min_neon
uint32_max_min_neon
int64_max_min_neon
uint64_max_min_neon
{code}

comments.body: Could a similar implementation be done for SVE?

[~baksmj] 
Not yet. We have not bare metal which supoorts SVE/SVE2 and could not get performance benchmark resluts.
The first step is to add Neon-128bit support.
This could be done in CI. A number of cloud providers offer machines with ARMv8.
